availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas E. Shiflett, Jr. (Madison County, Kentucky, laborer)

body.p: Madison County, Kentucky, laborer. Kentucky native. Son of Thomas Shiflett, Sr. and Anna Shiflett. Married to Elizabeth Orchard Shiflett in Madison County, Kentucky, on January 25, 1859. Father of Augusta Shiflett. Laborer in Madison County in 1860. Fined for tipling in Madison County in 1860. Fine remitted by Governor Beriah Magoffin in 1860. Farmer in Madison County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, District 1, p. 234A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, District 1, p. 329.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, Yates, p. 310B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Madison County, KY, July 1863, p. 317.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994047, Madison County Births, p. 695.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Madison County Marriages, Film 000183317, p. 9.
"Thomas Shiflett (1840-1929)," Find A Grave, Memorial 57366206, accessed January 25, 2024, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/57366206.
